text: 27.29 Sng 69.19, Ais 53.3 Lɨñɨl, nag ñuñu sek okok dad apɨl, bɨnonɨm kay lɨpal kɨmɨg cheg adek bad tek olap gɨl, kɨmɨg cheg nop lɨñɨlak. Lɨñɨl, bɨnonɨm okok kul abe dɨpal agɨl, gamɨl pal olap dɨl Jisas nop ñɨn yɨpɨd kɨd ak ñɨl, apɨl nop kɨgom yɨmɨl, agjulɨg agɨlak, Juda bɨnonɨm kɨli awl pel yenɨmɨn agɨlak.
